title: Everyone is embarrassed by someone, and that’s the neighbor we must learn to love.
description:

Biologos.org (I said .com, but who cares it’s a dumb website.)

Hans rookmaker

The fight for 53 rocks

https://answersingenesis.org/geology/grand-canyon/fight-53-rocks/
